amendment.description: An amendment numbered 4 printed in the Congressional Record to provide that the bill would not apply civil actions brought by, or on behalf of, a child or person injured at or before the age of 8, against a seller that is part of a chain with at least 20 outlets, that markets food products to minors 8 years of age or under.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lampson amendment (A007) Failed by voice vote.
